        print("Yes")
        return

            return
        kind = list(kind)

            print("No")
            return

                print("No")
                return
            kind = [b, a, b]
        else:
            if b_c > a_c:
                print("No")
                return
            kind = [a, b, a]
    kind.extend([kind[0], kind[-1]])
    for i in range(3):
        if kind[i] != kind[i - 1] ^ kind[i + 1]:
            print("No")
            return
    print("Yes")
if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
